SELECT u.user_idx AS userIdx, u.user_id AS userId,
u.password AS password, u.password_changed_at AS passwordChangedAt, u.password_failed_count AS passwordFailedCount,
u.name AS name, u.position AS position, u.joining_date AS joiningDate, u.birth_date AS birthDate, u.resignation_date AS resignationDate,
u.phone_number AS phoneNumber,
u.zipcode AS zipcode, u.addr1 AS addr1, u.addr2 AS addr2,
u.management_department AS managementDepartment, u.view_permission AS viewPermission,
u.dms_worker_yn AS dmsWorkerYn,
d.dept_nm AS deptNm, d.dept_idx AS deptIdx,
dl.dealer_nm AS dealerNm, dl.dealer_cd AS dealerCd,
u.reg_dt AS regDt, u.reg_user_id AS regUserId, u.mod_dt AS modDt, u.mod_user_id AS modUserId, u.del_dt AS delDt, u.del_user_id AS delUserId, u.del_yn AS delYn,
u.out_dt AS outDt, u.out_yn AS outYn
FROM afos_common.user u LEFT JOIN afos_common.dept d ON u.dept_idx = d.dept_idx LEFT JOIN afos_common.dealer dl ON d.dealer_cd = dl.dealer_cd
WHERE u.del_yn <> "Y"
AND u.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter.userSearchFilter.userId}, '%')
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter.userSearchFilter.name}, '%')
AND dl.dealer_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter.userSearchFilter.dealerNm}, '%')
AND dl.dealer_cd = #{filter.userSearchFilter.dealerCd}
AND d.dept_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter.userSearchFilter.deptNm}, '%')
AND u.position = #{filter.userSearchFilter.position}
AND (u.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter.userSearchFilter.globalField}, '%') OR u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter.userSearchFilter.globalField}, '%') OR dl.dealer_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter.userSearchFilter.globalField}, '%') OR d.dept_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter.userSearchFilter.globalField}, '%'))
AND u.reg_dt >= #{filter.dateRangeFilter.startDate}
AND u.reg_dt <= #{filter.dateRangeFilter.endDate}
AND u.mod_dt >= #{filter.dateRangeFilter.startDate}
AND u.mod_dt <= #{filter.dateRangeFilter.endDate}
AND u.del_dt >= #{filter.dateRangeFilter.startDate}
AND u.del_dt <= #{filter.dateRangeFilter.endDate}
ORDER BY u.user_idx DESC
